version_description:
*10 new levels
*Animation fixes and improvements
*Completed levels are now marked on level select screen
*Advertisement frequency reduced even more
*Fixed sound issues
*Added icons to all buttons
*For more detailed patch notes and to see what's coming next, check our Facebook page https://fb.me/NinjaTobu

*10 new levels
*Animation fixes and improvements
*Completed levels are now marked on level select screen
*Advertisement frequency reduced even more
*Fixed sound issues
*Added icons to all buttons
*For more detailed patch notes and to see what's coming next, check our Facebook page https://fb.me/NinjaTobu

* New mechanics for both endless and level mode
* 15 new levels
* Bug fixes

* New mechanics for both endless and level mode
* 15 new levels
* Bug fixes

* Powerups!
* Pause button
* 10 new levels
* Record and share replays
* New sound & music
* Fixed player hitboxes
* Enemies now defend themselves

* Powerups!
* Pause button
* 10 new levels
* Record and share replays
* New sound & music
* Fixed player hitboxes
* Enemies now defend themselves

1.3 is our biggest update yet!

Skins, accessories and special effects
Complete levels to earn coins
Coins can be spent on chests to unlock items
No more ads!
10 new levels
You can watch ads optionally to earn coins
Visit our facebook page for free coins
Video recording is now optional
Performance improvements
Enemies can be disarmed
Endless mode fixes

1.3 is our biggest update yet!

Skins, accessories and special effects
Complete levels to earn coins
Coins can be spent on chests to unlock items
No more ads!
10 new levels
You can watch ads optionally to earn coins
Visit our facebook page for free coins
Video recording is now optional
Performance improvements
Enemies can be disarmed
Endless mode fixes

* New enemy, has a ranged attack
* 10 new levels
* 5 New skins
* Added more variety to endless
* Bug and language fixes

* New enemy, has a ranged attack
* 10 new levels
* 5 New skins
* Added more variety to endless
* Bug and language fixes

* 10 new items - available in limited time offers, or rarely in chests
* 5 new levels
* Gameplay hints in endless mode
* Some super rare skins can fire up to 8 shurikens at a time
* Earn 25 coins by checking out some of our other games via in-game links
* Added Portuguese language
* Bug fixes

* 10 new items - available in limited time offers, or rarely in chests
* 5 new levels
* Gameplay hints in endless mode
* Some super rare skins can fire up to 8 shurikens at a time
* Earn 25 coins by checking out some of our other games via in-game links

* Bug fixes

* New wasteland enemy skins
* 10 new wasteland themed levels
* Translation improvements
* New music and sound effects

* New wasteland enemy skins
* 10 new wasteland themed levels
* Translation improvements
* New music and sound effects

* Fixed bug that prevented coins from being saved
* Increased reward for watching ads to 10 coins
* Increased reward for watching ad after endless to +100% coins instead of 50%

* Fixed bug that prevented coins from being saved
* Increased reward for watching ads to 10 coins
* Increased reward for watching ad after endless to +100% coins instead of 50%

* Increased Spawn Rate of Coins
* Added new Ninjas
* Added new skins and accessories
* Added new daily rewards system
* Added new levels
* Increased chance of getting rarer items from chests
* Added cloud saving
* Added chest rewards for some levels
* Bug fixes
